name: Wave Cursor
description: Changes your in-game cursor to your wave icon

enable-cursor.name: Enable custom cursor
enable-cursor.description: Enables or disables the wave cursor.

cursor-size.name: Cursor size
cursor-size.description: How large should the cursor appear?

always-force-hide-cursor.name: Always force hide cursor.
always-force-hide-cursor.description: Hide the platform cursor every game update. This may fix some issues with the platform cursor reappearing.

enable-trail.name: Enable Trail
enable-trail.description: Enable or disable showing a trail following the mouse cursor

disable-trail-on-playtest.name: Disable Trail during playtest
disable-trail-on-playtest.description: Disables the trail while playing a level for better sight-reading. This will have no affect if lock-cursor is on.

trail-type.name: Trail type
trail-type.description: What type of trail should the mouse inherit?
